article_title: Incoming U.S. Envoy to Colombia Causes Stir
article_text:
BOGOTA--Kevin Whitaker, nominated by President Barack Obama to be the next ambassador to Colombia, is creating controversy here even before he's arrived, following remarks he made in a Senate confirmation hearing in Washington when asked about the recent ouster of Bogota's mayor for allegedly bungling the city's trash collection system.

Colombia Inspector General Alejandro Ordonez on Monday sacked left-leaning Bogota Mayor Gustavo Petro and banned him from holding public office for 15 years after an investigation found the...
